title: Sampler, 1864
medium:
Medium: wool embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: tent, eyelet, and satin stitches on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Flowering plant in a vase; two peacocks; initials "W.C." and "1864" within border of scrolls with flowers.
